name: Sprint Hero
description:
Sprint Hero (name pending), currently in development.

Game inspired by (or is an unrefined clone of) Trigger Knight (by Mintsphere)

Hero sprints through the battlefield fighting monsters. Use items and buy upgrades with a single button. See how far you can go!

P.S. This is intended to be a mobile game, so the control scheme/layout might be strange on a desktop. Aspect ratio is locked at 16:9 (best viewed at 1920 x 1080 resolution) for now.
